main(String[]) - Static method in class it.azraelsec.Client.Client

main(String[]) - Static method in class it.azraelsec.Server.Server
Entry Point
MessageReceiver - Class in it.azraelsec.Chat
The MessageReceiver class represent a ChatMessage receiver which waits for new messages addressed to him and stores them in a List.
MessageReceiver() - Constructor for class it.azraelsec.Chat.MessageReceiver
It initializes the internal structure related to the UDP channel and message queue.
MessageSender - Class in it.azraelsec.Chat
The MessageSender class's purposes is to represent an agent which interacts with other MessageReceiver sending messages to them.
